message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $10,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $6,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down a bit to $9,000. I believe this product will be a valuable asset to you.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $7,500. Can you consider that?
